pullRequest.title: Adds gate blocks, for additional raid protection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
This adds two gate blocks, one wooden one iron which are craftable by the mechanic.
Those have a max size of 5x4 and combine their hardness depending on size and act like vanilla doors, so that citizens and any other door using mechanic should work with them.
Fix raiders still using their old anti-stuck mechanics in addition to the new stuckhandler ones.
Fix herder trying to breed with one item.
Fix raid difficulty starting at zero


Review please

commit.message: Add gates as additional defences against raiders, those are more sturdy and do not break as fast. Crafted by the mechanist

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/version/1.15' into raidoverhaul
